edge: a movie has a summary that provides details about the plot, characters, and other important aspects of the film
mother of Ram, disapproves of his relationship with Sona due to differences in social status
fall in love with each other despite differences in social status
brother of Ashwini, to be married to Sona but disapproved by her due to differences in social status
brother of Sona, helps her pay off a loan and rebuild their mother's tomb after being thrown out by their father
Zamindar who claims ownership of the land where Sona's mother's tomb is built due to an unpaid loan
best friend of Sona, invites her to a wedding
Ram is in love with Sona but is not accepted by her family due to his financial status.
Ashwini humiliates and throws out Sona and her brother's guest, Raghu, for trying to entice and trap Ram.
Lala does not approve of Ram's relationship with Sona due to his financial status.
Ajay wants to marry Sona but is opposed by her brother Raghu.
Rao and Jay Prakash try to kidnap and forcibly marry Sona to Ajay.
Ram eats red chillies and rice every day in order to prove his love for Sona, despite finding it unbearable.
Raghu gives Ram a chance to win back his acceptance and compete against him in growing crops.
Ajay wants to marry Sona but is opposed by her brother Raghu.
Jay Prakash and his daughter Dolly try to prevent Ram from winning Sona's love by getting in his way.
Ram and Sona should be together. The movie ends with Raghu's release from prison, which is also when Sona and Ram get married, in everyone's presence.
Initially opposes Sona's relationship with Ram but later accepts her as her daughter-in-law.
Spends seven years in prison for taking the blame, leading to their marriage at the end of the movie.
Remake of director Prabhu Deva's Telugu Film directorial debut Nuvvostanante Nenodantana.
Released on 10 May 2013, sung by Atif Aslam and Shreya Ghoshal.
